message.content:
Step 1: Determine the age difference between you and your sister when you were 6 years old.
You said that at the age of 6, your sister was half your age. So, her age = (1/2) * Your age at the time = (1/2) * 6 = 3 years old.

Step 2: Calculate how many years have passed since you were 6 years old.
You are now 80 years old. So, the number of years that have passed since you were 6 is 80 - 6 = 74 years.

Step 3: Determine your sister's current age by adding the age difference to the time that has passed.
Your sister's current age = Your current age - Age difference at 6 + Her initial age = 80 - 74 + 3 = 11 years old.

So, your sister is now 11 years old.
